content.detailedDescription:
I was outside of my house on my driveway around 2:15 am when i found
myself looking north toward the city amazed by the aura of light it produced.  i immediately noticed a very bright and somewhat distant l
ball of light slowly moving in the sky. for the first few seconds, i dismissed it, it resembled a meteor or "shooting star".  there were no audible frequencies emitted. then the object began to stutter around in a relatively small radius from my perspective. after about a minute the ball of light just sped off into space at a very accute angle. i would estimate the object accelerated from 0 to several thousend miles per hour in less than half a second. i remember thinking "finally i have seen one".  if only it were closer to me i may have been able to make out it's color.  it emitted a similar wavelength of light similar to a
xenon headlight of a bmw.  very beautiful.
content.summary: Object was staggering in the sky then sped off with incredible acceleration.

content.detailedDescription: This happened very briefly, was outside bringing the trash out when i looked up into the sky and saw this glowing orange circle which quickly turned into 3 other circles (so 4 total) they went downwards at an angle about 45 degree angle, the objects all appeared to be connected to each other, then quickly went out, didnt fade out went out like you would turn off a light switch. then about 5 minutes later in the same area this bright orange circle appeared and quickly went out. this time it was only 1 circle. saw nothing again after that.
content.summary: 4 round orange glowing objects

content.detailedDescription: One night my dogs had to use the bathroom so i let them out and i went out with them and walked away from the house and lean on the gate not paying any attention, then i dont know what made me look up but off in the distance but over my house i see somthing swinging back and forth. it was the wierdest thing ive ever seen

I had my camera in sports mode. exposure was set to 1/350 and the shutter was set to 1/362.  i shot a series of six photos at this speed and in the third frame, an object appeared and was gone in the fourth frame, less than a fraction of a second later.  object appears to be cigar shaped with a cone centerd on the top.  it also appears to be reflecting light.  i make no claims as to what it may be,(perhaps a bug or something moving very quickly) i thought that it looked odd and then i saw your t.V. show this evening about sightings in bucks county around this very time and thought you might be interested in seeing my photo. maybe with your resources you can have the photo cleaned up to show more details. i have attached three photos, one just before the object, one with the object and the one immediately after the object.  look forward to hearig what you folks think.  thanks for your time.
content.summary: Objec appeared than disappeared in less than 1 second, i have photo.

content.detailedDescription:
1. began on sept. 19th 2004- dec. 19th 2004 in warrenville illinois 3:30am-7:15am
2. stationary star like object in the sky, however would rotate with the movement of the earth
3. was first sighted  by me in august 2004 and decided to take photos of object in sept. 2004
4. object has been seen all over the world in other countries as well.
5. objects on photos were not the object seen in real time
6. object seemed to have been trying to communicate through digital technology, almost projecting a hologram.
7. standing on a suburban street not moving with no cars or lights around.

     i have numerous photos of light beings that look like something out of the movie "the abyss", asteroids, a morphing organic like object and what seems to look like tears in our fabric of time. a gaping whole in the sky that appears to look like a worm hole which is allowing other space crafts to come through into our demension.  as crazy as this may sound, i have proof to prove it. it is imperative to know that these photos were taken with a digital camera. so there is no way "whatsoever" that i could take a picture of the asteroid "tutoutis".  i saved the newspaper clipping of the article that came out on sept. 21st 2004, just two days after i took the photo.  what i am trying to tell you is that this object was trying to communicate to me through the photos. as you can see "they" came up to me while being in the street. of coarse i couldn't see them at the time.  it must be that the digital camera could pick up what the human eye can't. i would love to meet in person to share these photos.  i have them saved on a memory chip so none of them have beenn altered. i only am e-mailing you some of the many photos that i have. if your interested in seeing more, please by all means contact me.
                                           sincerely,
content.summary: Huge star like object that was rising in the eastern sky at 3:30am and waning out to the se @ 7:15am. last object shining in thew sky @ sunrise

content.detailedDescription: I and 5 other people were on lake murray in a boat and i saw the beautiful stars and decided to take a pic of them. i aimed the camera up at the stars and snapped the pic hoping that it would take.  i got a pic of this thing in the sky.  to me it looks odd.  i immediately showed my husband and then he looked up also.  did not see anything.  i showed my friends on the boat as well.  they looked up and saw nothing.  what is this?
content.summary: Round with top sticking up

content.detailedDescription: I just saw your show ufos over earth in bucks county pa - there was a ufo report on the local news by the oxford valley mall it would have been in the same direction as the sightings on the show toward the air base the people who reported it to the news are from morrisville pa . i think in news report they had a picture i cant remember the actual date but it was earlier than the sightings on the show and the ufos were a different shape it was on kyw channel 3 news at 11 oclock or wpvi channel 6 i watch both so i don't remember what channel i was watching that night.
content.summary: Reporting  a sighting in bucks county pa

content.detailedDescription:
Reguarding the case of i believe of a "kathleen" in which "glitter" was deposited and recollected and showed unusually high levels of boron. i have a hypothesis to follow the article.

common uses of boron
borax, the most common natural form of boron, has a wide variety of uses. borax is used in cleaning compounds, glass and ceramics, fertilizers, papers and paints, and fire retardants. borax is also used in enamels covering the steel of refrigerators, washing machines, and other like objects.

boron nitride, or borazon, is a hard material and is used as an abrasive.

boracic acid is used as a mild antiseptic.

other boron compounds are used for heat-resistant glass, detergents and soaps, enamels, and medicine. 

boron is known as a very hard element. it is also very strong and light weight. boron is almost as hard as diamond, so it is used in place diamonds in many cases. boron is added to steel for extra hardness and strength at high temperatures.

boron is conducts heat very well, and is a great insulator, thus it has increasingly amounts of technological appliances.

boron also serves many uses in atomic energy. it is used in instruments designed to detect, and count slow neutrons. it also has a high absorption of neutrons, so it is used as a control absorber in nuclear reactors.

my hypothesis:
    1.)if these are e.T.S mabe they need to extract boron in order to strengthen their bone structures to counter the effects of space that cause bone loss. but why not just beam it up from a drug store?
     
in any case it is interesting to see this element show up due to the technological applications it is used for especially the nuclear, and ceramics fields as i believe they will both in the very near future be used by us (if not already) to create craft with the magnetic and electronic powerplant properties neccessary to conduct these flight charactoristics. 

i would love to hear back from you regaurding my thoughts and share some ideas.
this was based on ufo's over earth on the science channel at 9pm eastern on monday november 24th
content.summary: This is some interesting info i found

content.detailedDescription: It was the evening of november 15,2008 around 8:15 or 8:20 when my friend connor hughes and i were driving down state highway 177 headed to get groceries from sillwater which is about 11 miles away from perkins. we were about 1 mile away from the highway intersection headed north on highway 177 when something caught my eye. over the oklahoma state agriculture fields there was this shape with three white lights. at first glance we thought it was a cell phone tower of some sort and as we got to looking there was no base so it wasnt a tower. the object had three white lights at the ends indicating that it was of a triangular shape. the object was approximately 100,yes 100 feet off the ground. i then drove onto a side dirt road that was parallel with the field it was over. as soon as we turned on the road it was like it jumped or skipped about 100 to 150 yards.We then pusued the object for the mile stretch heading east now.Once we got to the intersection it all of a sudden shot away about 3 miles and soon was out of sight. keep in mind this object hovered in one spot for more then 5 minutes and what i forgot to mention was that we got out of the car on the road and the object made no noise i repeat no noise. this is not the first sighting in payne county this is actually my second sighting of an unidentified object in the past 3 years.
content.summary: Very breathtakin almost unbelieveable hover object

content.detailedDescription: We were out on a boat in lake murray,having fun with 6 people and i wanted to try to take a picture of the bright stars.  i picked a spot and took the picture and saw what i took and showed my husband immediately.  we both lookede up at the sky and saw nothing.  i showed the others on the boat and they looked up and saw nothing either.  i've kept the pic every since.  didn't know what to do with it.
content.summary: Round bottom with top sticking up

content.detailedDescription:
I was 14 years old and was outside with friends playing in the road in front of my house when i happend to notice a single red light comming strait toward us. it was traveling parrelell to the road in front of my house. as it came closer i could tell that it was made up of 6 or 8 red lights that made the shape of either a hexagon or an octagon.
when it got strait above me it seemed to have launched a single red lighted object at a 90 degree angle to the main object. the main object continued due west and the other to the south.
i watched both objects continue untill thay faded out of sight
please let me know if there has ever been a report like this one

                         thank you 
                                  ray williams
content.summary: Octagon shape made up of red lights that launched another red object at a 90 degree angle.

content.detailedDescription:
On sunday, nov. 23, 2008 i was driving west on the pennsylvania 

turnpike from the willow grove exit to the downingtown exit.  

between the valley forge/king of prussia exit and downingtown 

(approximately 13 miles of highway) i saw 7 different ufos that 

looked the same as each other.  they looked like the ones i 

reported last week.  each one was the shape of a trapezoid with 

rounded edges, with  2 bright "headlights" and a dull green 

light on one back corner and a dull red light on the other back 

corner.  tonight, the red and green lights were pulsing.


7:02 pm 	mile marker 325
moving right to left across turnpike (south).  i passed 

directly underneath the object as it moved.  it was quite slow- 

maybe 20 miles an hour.


7:05	mm322
didn't note where it was moving


7:08	mm319
ufo to the left (south) of the turnpike.  saw it at the same 

time i was seeing the next one.  this one was near mile marker 

319.


7:08	mm320
ufo a little to the left (south) of the turnpike/crossing over 

(heading north), higher up than the others, moving to right.  i 

could see this one when i was at mile marker 319, but it was 

physically closer to mile marker 320.


7:10	mm317/yellow springs road
this ufo was at mile marker 317, where yellow springs road 

crosses over the turnpike.  the ufo was just north of the 

turnpike.


7:12	mm317
it was to the right (north) of turnpike, moving parallel 

w/turnpike but heading east.


7:14	mm312/downingtown exit
to the right (north) of turnpike, heading east.
content.summary: Saw 7 ufos in a 12 minute window while on pa turnpike

content.detailedDescription: I was 6 maybe 7 years old and this occurred sometime between the summer of 90 and the fall of 91.  i was young so the date is hard to remember but the image is permanently burned into my brain.  it was late in the evening and my family had all gathered for a little party, and it was all coming to an end.  i cannot remember exactly who was there but there were several of us in my driveway when the sighting occurred.  as we all walked in the driveway, as members of my family were going to their cars we noticed lights coming over my house.  the craft floated slowly over the my house and coasted at a height that seemed low enough, to my young mind, that it was possible to pick up a rock and throw it in the air striking the underside of the craft.  there were three lights in each corner of the craft.  the craft seemed to form a perfect equilateral triangle with the lengths of the sides at approximately 40 ft long.  as i looked with my peripheral i searched for a rock and before i was able to pick up a rock that i found, in my driveway the craft moved slightly faster and within a few seconds it wa across the street and about 200 yards away.  when it reached a distance of about 400 yards away it ascended and went out of sight.  this all happened in a matter of 10 seconds.  the craft was utterly silent.  this was without a doubt the most terrifying moment in my life.  since that day i have been scared to go out into my driveway at night.  i am scared to look into the night sky.  this was the most real experience of my life.  i know for a fact that this was a real experience.  if you lived in cincinnati in the early nineties and you saw a ufo, report it. please help me find out anything about this.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile
content.summary: Triangular shaped craft slowly hovered close to ground, before rapidly flying away

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving rt220 going towards state college, pa from bellefonte, pa.
when i notices bright lights in the shape of an octagon over a tree line ahead. first i thought it was street lights on the side of the parkway but as i drove closer it took shape in the sky.  i couldn't determine the size of the object as i could only see the lights in the sky.  it looked to be hovering in a stationary position over the tree line. the lights  were about 50ft to 100ft apart from eachother in the shape of an octagon there where 5 lights overall.  all i know i wasn't staying around to find out what it exactly was so i went back to my hotel. while i was driving away it looked to be slowly moving towards the sky. and then in a matter of seconds it disapeared from my sight. the following morning i drove by the area to see if there were anything i could have mistaken it with and there was only forest. i have always been entriged by ufo's and researched them as a kid but experiencing it first hand was more than what i expected. it is very scary because of the whole concept of the unknown but also cool as i thought i would never see something like this in my lifetime. i placed an attachment of what i seen i did take a picture on my cell phone only it took a black photo but i drew a little something to give everyone an idea...
content.summary: I thought it wasn't real but it was

content.detailedDescription: At sunset in the wheel house of the boat mr fern pushinging barges with my uncle(rip)headed west towards galviston tx. a silver glowing disc shaped object appeared over the barges. it hoovered on top the barges for a few seconds we looked at one another in disbeliefe (me and my uncle)i graped the vhs radio hollered what do you want who are you then it took off immediately towards the south west and was out of sight just as fast as it had appeared.My uncle and i agreed no one would believe us and we kept it to ourselves untill now.
content.summary: A object appeard above the barges we were pushing on intercostal waterways it was silver looking.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home on the northway going south sometime just after midnight in 1976. i remember it was very dark that night and i do not remember seeing a moon. there were colored lights everywhere in a black sky. it reminded me of what the woman tonight on tv was telling mufon about "glitter". the only difference is what i saw were lights of various colors. there did not seem to be any pattern. this went on for a long time. i do remember seeing the lights from a plane that was going to land at albany airport. it started it's decent across the northway and was surrounded by this glitter. i was thinking whatever this is...It's on their radar. i do not remember driving or hearing any noise what so ever. i do know there were some cars in back of me driving very slowly watching in disbelief as i was. suddenly to the left there was a huge ball of light that decended rapidly. i was absolutely shocked at what i was seeing.

when i arrived home i immediately called my mother who told me it was on the three available networks...Channel 6, 10 and 13 i believe.
the next day there was some kind of news blackout because it was treated as if it never happen. 

all these years i have hoped someone would report seeing what i saw that night. this is the first time i've heard anyone say glitter. that is exactly what it looked like.

thank you.
sincerely,
[cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: I am writing this because i was just watching your show on witness describing glitter

content.detailedDescription: My husband called me from the parking lot at the shoprite that is located within blocks of our home.  he asked me to hurry up and run out across the street and see if i saw what he just saw pass overhead of him in the parking lot.  he told me that the object was coming toward the park that is directly across the street from our house.  when i ran out i saw a black flying object that looked like a human figure holding on to something directly above it like an umbrella.  i laughed because it almost made me think of a mary poppins type figure but it was completely black and was moving a little faster and more direct than anything like a balloon would.  not only that but it was a good 150 feet in the air and looked to be a bit larger than any person would ever be.  the object moved at a steady pace, was completely silent,  and was flying in a direct horizontal movement across the tops of the tree line.   i didn't know what to think about the object and questioned to myself,  "ok if that was a person flying throught the sky....Huh what am i saying people don't fly through the sky."   i  did not think that it was any flying craft that i had ever seen.  the figure looked almost like a completely black human figure, head to toe,  with another round black shape just above it.  my husband and i just kind of laughed and said "what the hell was that?"   but at the same time we were really puzzled but didn't know who to notify.  my husband and i still wonder if anyone else had seen this same object in this area around this time.
content.summary: Black assymetrical flying object

content.detailedDescription: My friend called me up to come over and see the balls of light because he saw them a week before and they were back.  he lives around the corner and sure enough there were three stationary lights in the sky in a big triangle.  over a pretty large area.  they were not stars or aircraft, because there were stars and aircraft that we could see and they weren't comparable, they were just sitting there not moving and very bright.  it was freezing cold that night so we stood out there for about a half hour with the binoculars, but couldn't get any pics, i tried to on my cell phone but couldn't get it.  they didn't move and i went home.  he called me later and said that eventually they went away, but he said he started seeing them at about 6:00 pm, i left around 7:15 pm and when he called about 7:30 he said they were gone.  i called the police and the local news station to find out if anyone else called.  i figured someone else had to see them, but both said no one called.  i called the east norrition police dept. they took my name and number.  they looked like they were very high in the sky though,  it was dark.  but they were about plane level or maybe higher.  they were not planes and they were not stars.  we both saw it.
content.summary: My friend called me up to come over and see the balls of light because he saw them a week before.  he lives around the corner and shore enough there were three stationary lights in the sky in a big triangle.  over a pretty large area.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work at approximately 8:00am on m-14 west between us-23 and i-94. i noticed to object in the distance about on my right at appoximately my 2 o'clock. i cannot say what the distance to the object was but it appeared to be at a distance of 1/2-1 miles. the altitude appeared to be around 500ft. the object looked like a black and white top spinning and stationary. my attention was diverted for a moment and i lost the object. approximately 30 seconds later, the object appeared on my left at approximately the same altitude but now nearly directly overhead. what struck me as odd was the nearly immediate change in position. it would have to have had an extremely high velocity to change its position that quickly but i observed no horizontal velocity. i was on the phone with my wife at the time and described the events and object to her. i lost sight of the object in the treeline as i continued down m-14.
content.summary: An inverted teardrop shape with alternating black and white as though rotating.

content.detailedDescription: This object was a meteor moved at meteor speed from northeast to southwest and was breaking up and burned out at tree line and was yellow in color, typical fireball meteor i've seen them a number of times and even had the chance to see one that was so close you hear it crackeling similar to what sound the space shuttle makes when in accent and a few miles off the deck.. but in this case something odd happened a minute or less later, after me and my girlfriend saw the meteor come down we were talking to eachother about what we just saw and th recent sighting in canada of a fireball meteor and looking in the same direction we saw a dimmer object same shape, speed as meteor ,leaving the ground moving in the exact opposite direction at a very high rate of speed and just vanished after moving 40 degrees ... this sighting has me puzzled and wondering how this is possible...Meteors do move from ground up!
content.summary: A meteor fireball type came down from northeast and moved southwest and a minute later a somewhat dimmer object same speed shape moved from ground to sky in oposite direction "very strange."

content.detailedDescription:
On the show of 11/24/08 the man from bucks county discribed exactly the same craft that i had discribed to mufon when i reported. admitidly i took a long time to report my craft but i didn't want to appear crazy.
a ship that floated over me without sound (i actually think that all sound crickets and all were gone) it took up the whole area over my head and the only way that i could determine size was when it passed and you could see the rear windows where you could make out movement inside. the craft seemed to be less than 200 feet over my head.
content.summary: That is the exact ufo that i had reported earlier.

content.detailedDescription:
the evening of august 3, 2008 at about 10:20 pm my husband and i were sitting outside with our neighbors on their deck when something in the sky off to the east caught our attention. it was extremely bright, multi-colored,  moving quickly and leaving a trail...It exploded, or appeared to explode in a very bright flash and disappeared. it was amazing!

when i came into the house that night, i began a thread in our local newspaper's forum, to see if anyone else had seen this same thing and if they knew what it was.  there were several other people who confirmed that they had witnessed it also.


the local paper (the forum is located on the paper's website) ended up  doing a story on the "sighting" since several people admitted to seeing it also.  through their research they said that it was the international space station making a closeby pass.    the space station theory just doesn't make sense.  i don't know if it was a meteor, a bolide or something else but it was very pretty and had a very colorful tail trailing it.  i looked up pictures of what the space station looks like from earth as it makes a pass, and it looked nothing like what we saw.

to this day we still wonder exactly what it was.
content.summary: Extremely bright, moving quickly and leaving a trail...It exploded in a flash and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: We were driving down interstate 5 and my girlfriend noticed a strobing light so we just watched it. we noticed that it would move in a very weird way. it would zip across the sky in a way a plane could not. we were straining to see it as we were driving, but many many people saw it and were calling in the radio stations. also news 10 covered the story.
content.summary: Flashing, almost strobing light that moved very irradically

content.detailedDescription:
I awoke early in the morning.. between 6:00 & 6:30 to let my dog out. seeing as he hadn't awoken yet, i walked by my front door to look out the window to see how light it was. through the long window panel on the side of my front door, i noticed an aspirin sized (size it appeared to be from where i stood) orange/yellow orbish shape hovering in the sky. it was quite a different shape than a star.. it appeared to flucuate from an upside down bowl w/ saucer shape to an oval orb..Almost as if it were shape shifting. the right bottom side of the object grew brighter as the left side grew dimmer, and then reveresed to the alternate side. 

it wasn't moving but it wasn't the sun as the it was an hour before sunrise. it didn't appear to be a star either as the sky was lit up with still visible white stars. i couldn't explain what i was seeing other than to "know" it was a ufo. all i can say is that i felt it was so beautiful, and i felt at peace, and no hositility or fearfullness from it.

i should say i have had a previous, although different encounter of seeing a ufo 18 years previously in the same town. and i know what something that diffies logical explanation looks like. i wanted to take a picture of it, but my spouse had taken the digital camera on an out of town trip the night before!!! i remained very at peace as it was quite lovely and knowing that there was no one i could wake up and show it too, or take a picture of it, i headed back to bed. i felt pretty ill later that morning when i akoke mid sunday morning and strangely enough forgot to mention it to my spouse until 3 days later!!!
content.summary: Orange-yellow orb observed in pre dawn sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside having a cig and i was like man i wish you guys(the visitors) would show yourself...And after i got done saying this i saw a light in the norther part of the sky threw the trees coming my way. i thought at first it was just a plane the as it got closer i thought different. my fiance doesnt believe in ufos or aliens and when i saw this i ran inside to get her and she was like what is that? i told her to listen,do you here any sound from it she said no! i told her for a craft that size and as close as it was to us we should be hearing it. and she said yeah,you would think you would.? after that the object moved away from left to right and dissapeared over the trees and where i was standing i could no longer follow the object.
 ive seen more stuff in the sky at my house as well on one insident it was a black ball looking thing and it moved silently threw the sky. the next day there was a black helecopter flying around the area in a leaning position as if it was looking for something. it done this for about 10 minutes and dissapeared.
content.summary: Like a plane but made no sound. it had a tail like a plane that was alluminated,and had 2 white and 1 red light flashing on it.

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to have a cigarette with my husband and spotted another one. this was about the same spot as the one last night, my son says it's about 70 degrees up in the sky to the south. i ran in to grab my video camera and call the kids out. the youngest stayed inside, she thinks we're nuts. this one was moving to the west slowly then emitted a particle trail like the one yesterday and then was moving south or decending. we didn't get to see it long enough to get it sighted in with the telescope because after it did the explosion part we couldn't see it very well with our eyes, well the two kids that came out could still see it as it was brightening and dimming. there was also a satellite or another object that passed in front of it, south west to the north east, as it was headed south, we think maybe a satellite. looking at the satellite i lost sight of the object and so i tried to get the satellite on tape. there was none-to little wind and some clouds. we will be looking for more in the days ahead.
content.summary: Another bright white sphere that has some kind of emission

content.detailedDescription:
I was heading down 9 going towards columbia city.  it was around 4:45 am going to work.  i was south of merriam closer to columbia city.  not paying too much attention to the sky because i was watching for deer as they often run into the road at that time of the morning!  looking ahead i saw a light in the sky,greenish in color.  at first glance i thought it was a shooting star.  then i realized shooting stars were not that color.
it was heading east on a downward slide. it went from the right to the left of me.  once it got to the left of me it stopped in mid air, backed up and went straight down.  when it stopped ,backed up and went straight down, i knew it was a controled move.  as far as i could tell, it landed east of columbia city.  but i couldn't say if it was north or south of it.  i'm thinking north.  all i was thinking was, what a cool way to start my day!  it wasn't until it disapeared that i remembered my cellphone has a camera in it.  since that sighting, i keep my phone in my lap just in case!
content.summary: It was going east on a downward slide, stopped, backed up a little and went straight down.

content.detailedDescription:
At about 18:30 pm i was standing on the back deck of my house in full darkness observing the night sky. the milky way was visible, and numerous distinct stars. i saw a small meteorite streak & burn up. about 2 minutes later, a round glowing object about the size of a distant star moved across the sky very fast, high, and without a sound. it eminated a steady white light, but also rhythmically flashed red light as it moved from the sw to the ne in a straight trajectory very quickly.  then 1 to 2 minutes later, a large bright white object appeared from the sw and also moved very fast ne in a straight path which seemed to pursue the first object. it seemed to be several miles in altitude, but was fully at least 10 times brighter and larger in diameter than the brightest star. it too moved completely silently across the sky. my house is in the country, and except for 2 dogs barking in the distance, no sound was heard. this object definitely was not a satellite nor a plane. both objects seemed to take up a stationary position, in a triangular configuration with a star, in the nnw sky, perhaps 20 to 30 degrees elevation from horizon. the largest object continuously pulsated white, green, red, blue, as did the smaller object.  i watched for 10 minutes and then left the property.

have there been any other reports of these 2 anomalies?
content.summary: Bright white round light moved fast & silent from sw to ne in straight trajectory

content.detailedDescription:
Me and some friends went on a trip to denmark. a close friend (i'm going to call him john) told me (a few weeks before this happened) that he saw strange objects in the sky back in sweden. i believed him and got interested. so that night in denmark, me and john were the only ones awake. all my other friends were asleep so me and john decided to go to the beach wich was located less than 40 yards from our hotel. the main reason was to search for ufos, becaus john just had a feeling that something was going to show up in the sky. so we went down to the beach and stood there looking up in the sky for about 10 minutes. what happened after those 10 minutes was the wierdest thing that had ever happened to me. we saw a huge flash that lit up the whole sky and the whole beach. the flash just came from nowhere and the night literally became daylight for about 2 seconds and then everything went dark again. suddenly everything became even more interesting. i wasn't scared, i was amazed.
john had seen this flash three times before so he didn't react in any special way. he just told me to keep looking up in the sky. so we stood there again, looking at the same part of the sky and a few minutes after the flash a strange "light ball" appeared in the sky. we both saw it and reacted at the same time. i don't know how to describe the motions of the object in a good way, but it was almost as if the ball was going down towards the water. it went in a vertical direction. it's really hard to explain but i tried my best. anyways, the "light ball" went extremely fast from point a to point b in 1 second and then dissapeared. we continued looking up and we stood there for almost an hour before another "light ball" appeared again. but this time the distance between point a and point b was bigger, i mean the ball flew a longer distance before it dissapeared again and it flew in a vertical direction just like the earlier one. i couldn't see the actual shape of the object since the light coming from the object was very bright. i just saw the object like a ball-shaped thing. after this we stood on the beach for one hour but nothing happened. it was really cold outside so we went back to the hotel and went to bed. but believe me, if the was better we would sit there on the beach the whole night.

i tried to explain everything as detailed as i could, i hope you understood me. i apologize for my bad english.
this is just half of the story. the reason why i don't want to tell you the whole story is becaus it's a really wierd story wich started more than a month before this event and the story is out of this world so i guess people wont believe me if i tell it. it's pretty sick, trust me you're not going to believe me. if you wanna hear the story anyways you can contact me on my email.
content.summary: A flash that lit up the whole sky followed by two extremely fast ufos.

content.detailedDescription:
I was letting my dogs out after just arriving home. it was a beautiful, clear night so i was admiring the early evening view. that is when i spotted a light that was not blinking -- unlike all the other flying objects i ever see over my house.

the light had somewhat of a floodlight appearance emanating from it (i could make out a vague funnel of light), but it flared out quite wide, it was not a focused beam/tight-funnel like a spotlight.

i expected to hear some distinct engine noise as the light was brighter than the other air traffic. it's altitude was difficult to judge, but it was flying higher than normal local private plane and helicopter traffic, but seemed lower than airliners from/to columbus.

i could not make out any shape, it was just a bright light. 

the sky was clear and cloudless, the object was brighter than an airliner, and at one point from my vantage, it looked to pass below an airliner. the only sounds i heard were the distant rumble of airliners (no helicopter beating, or anything else out of the ordinary).

i could see two airliners in the same portion of the sky when this object was visible. one airliner was heading n-nw towards columbus, the other was moving se away from columbus. this object was headed ne, moved in a straight line, and stayed a constant speed, until it eventually moved beyond my sight.
content.summary: Bright, non-blinking light -- didn't look like normal air traffic.
